head.title: COVID-19 - Bolivar Schools

input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

a.title: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference
a.span: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference

a.title: Missouri Course Access and Virtual School Program
a.span: Missouri Course Access and Virtual School Program

li.a: Bolivar High School to join Ozark Conference
Missouri Course Access and Virtual School Program

span.style: font-size: 16px;
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: through the remainder of the academic year. Bolivar Schools will continue to support the distance learning program through online teaching,

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);
background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

font-size: 16px; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
white-space: pre-wrap; font-size: 16px;
span.strong: Is it true that the Missouri Department of Elementary and Secondary Education will not allow students to move on to the next grade level for the 2020-2021 school year, due to the school closures caused by COVID-19?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: No. There was a fake letter circulating on social media that is not true. The letter is fake and unfortunately, part of an insensitive and disappointing April Fool's day joke.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: Governor Parson has ordered the closure of all Missouri schools through the remainder of the academic year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: If schools are closed, will students receive meals?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: We will continue with our meal delivery program. For more information, go here.

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: How will the Bolivar School District keep families, staff, and students informed regarding coronavirus?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: Any district updates will be conveyed through regular district channels including email, voice and text messaging, phone app, social media, and district website (bolivarschools.org).

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: What is the protocol for cleaning and disinfecting schools and buses?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: During the closure, all facilities and buses will be thoroughly cleaned and disinfected. High-touch surfaces such as tables, doorknobs, handrails, drinking fountains, and keyboards will be disinfected on a more frequent basis.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: When should a staff member stay home?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: If staff experience a fever of 100.4 degrees or higher, cough and/or difficulty breathing, the

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; text-decoration-line: underline; text-decoration-skip-ink: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(17, 85, 204);

font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: recommends they should stay home from school and contact their health care provider immediately.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: Will school events and travel be canceled?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: All events and activities scheduled at Bolivar Schools' facilities are canceled for the remainder of the academic school year.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: What conversations should parents have with their children at home?

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);

p.span: We know families, staff and students are concerned. We are committed to keeping you informed and working with you to keep our school communities safe.

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(0, 89, 153);

a.span: Here’s an informative graphic resource from NPR

span.style: font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;
span.strong: Where can I turn for more information?

span.style: background-color: transparent; font-size: 12pt; white-space: pre; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);
font-size: 12pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; color: rgb(0, 89, 153);

p.style: list-style-type: disc; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Roboto, sans-serif; color: rgb(33, 37, 41); background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre;

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(38, 38, 39);

span.span: Any calls for basic COVID-19 information should be directed to the

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 89, 153);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(38, 38, 39);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 89, 153);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(33, 37, 41);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(38, 38, 39);

span.span: Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services. The Missouri Department of Health and Senior Services (DHSS) activated a statewide public hotline (

span.style: font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 89, 153);
font-size: 11.5pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(38, 38, 39);

span.span: for citizens or providers needing guidance regarding the novel coronavirus, or COVID-19. The hotline is being operated by medical professionals and is available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.
